entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:46 p.m. CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
